title: How to Maximize Your Firm's Long-Term Value
description: Allen Darby, CEO of Alaris Acquisitions, on M&A and how to analyze your profit and loss statement to uncover ways to enhance your firm's worth.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Allen Darby, CEO of Alaris Acquisitions, on M&A and how to analyze your profit and loss statement to uncover ways to enhance your firm's worth.
content:encoded: Allen Darby, CEO of Alaris Acquisitions, on M&A and how to analyze your profit and loss statement to uncover ways to enhance your firm's worth.
